text: Himalaya: Caravan () is a 1999 Nepalese French British Swiss Monégasque adventure movie directed by Éric Valli and starring Thinle Lhondup, Tsering Dorjee, Lhakpa Tsamchoe, Gurgon Kyap. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 2000. ==Other websites== * Category:1999 adventure movies Category:Nepalese movies Category:French adventure movies Category:British adventure movies Category:Swiss adventure movies Category:Monégasque movies Category:Movies directed by Éric Valli Category:Movies set in Nepal
title: Himalaya (movie)
